name: Create a Zoho Recruit job opening and send a Slack message from an updated Airtable record
description:
Use this template to automatically create a Zoho Recruit job opening and send a Slack message when an Airtable record is updated.

The template works with the following [Airtable base](https://airtable.com/shr1MWSUm3TaFzhuU). The scenario is triggered when the 'Status' field is updated. To achieve that, we created the 'Last modified' field of type 'Last modified time' and chose to watch updates in the 'Status' field only.
